thread.title: Cathy Isaacs
thread.title_full: Antique Lamp Supply reviewed by Cathy Isaacs

author: Cathy Isaacs
title: Cathy Isaacs
text: We are refurbishing some antique chandeliers from a house my daughter bought. The house was built in 1928 and we believe the chandeliers are original to the house. I was able to find all the crystal drops and the chains we needed to replace the ones that had gone missing over the years. The chandeliers look great now!
